en_definition: to become or make something become available in a place in large numbers
a plant grown in warm countries for the soft white hairs around its seeds that are used to make cloth and thread
the cloth made from the cotton plant
a man
any small creature with six legs and a body divided into three parts
to produce liquid on skin / surface
drops of liquid that appear on the surface of your skin when you are hot, ill / sick or afraid
a place where ships load and unload goods or shelter from storms
an amount of money that is taken off the usual cost of something
to make clothes, etc. smooth by using an iron
a tool with a flat metal base that can be heated and used to make clothes smooth
the selling of goods or services to another country
to sell goods or services to another country
to be slow to speak or act because you feel uncertain or nervous
money in the form of coins or notes / bills
to get something useful from a situation; to be useful to somebody or give them an advantage
the money that you make in business or by selling things, especially after paying the costs involved
money to buy the things that you need in life
alive now
an alcoholic drink made from the juice of grapes
trousers / pants made of strong cotton, especially denim
connected with the trade, industry, and development of wealth of a country, an area or a society
zh_definition: 经济的；经济上的；经济学的

en_definition: to include something as an important or necessary part or result of it
zh_definition: 包含；需要；使成为必然部分（或结果）

en_definition: the money that a person, a region, a country, etc. earns from work, from investing money, from business, etc.
a way of dealing with or discussing a subject, work of art, etc.
an amount or a number of something
a set of clothes and equipment that you use for a particular activity
a set of tools or equipment that you use for a particular purpose
a room or hall with equipment for doing physical exercise, for example in a school
the air that you take into your lungs and send out again
the place where a particular type of animal or plant is normally found
to bring a product, service, an idea, etc. into one country from another
to be used instead of something / somebody else; to do something instead of something / somebody else
to state officially, especially in writing, that something is true
to say or do something to show that you disagree with or disapprove of something, especially publicly
making you feel embarrassed
zh_definition: 令人尴尬的；使人难堪的

en_definition: the largest part of a group of people or things
a form of air pollution that is or looks like a mixture of smoke and fog, especially in cities
one page of an electronic presentation, that may contain text and images, that is usually viewed on a computer screen or projected onto a larger screen
to cut and gather a crop
a sweet sticky yellow substance made by bees that is spread on bread, etc. like jam
(of food, etc.) having a strong, unpleasant taste; not sweet
(of arguments, disagreements, etc.) very serious and unpleasant, with a lot of anger and hatred involved
zh_definition: （争论、分歧等）激烈而不愉快的；充满愤怒与仇恨的

en_definition: how food or drink tastes
to cook nuts, beans, etc. in order to dry them and turn them brown; to be cooked in this way
to cook food, especially meat, without liquid in an oven or over a fire; to be cooked in this way
a substance that flows freely and is not a solid or a gas, for example water or oil
in the form of a liquid
a piece of something with straight sides
a place where you can buy and drink alcoholic and other drinks
to use numbers to find out a total number, amount, distance, etc.
the way that parts of a machine or a system work; the process of making something work
having the most modern and recently developed ideas, methods, etc.
(of a course of study) at a high or difficult level
a form of something that is slightly different from an earlier form or from other forms of the same thing
a group of twelve of the same thing
correct and true in every detail
the act of saving something / somebody from a dangerous or difficult situation; the fact of being saved
the practical use of something, especially a theory, discovery, etc.
a formal (often written) request for something, such as a job, permission to do something or a place at a college or university
zh_definition: （尤指理论、发现等的）应用，运用

en_definition: the things that are needed for a particular purpose or activity
to or in a foreign country, especially those separated from your country by the sea or ocean
connected with foreign countries, especially those separated from your country by the sea or ocean
unusual or surprising in a way that causes people to take notice
a flight into space
an important official job that a person or group of people is given to do, especially when they are sent to another country
if you say that somebody did something in spite of a fact, you mean it is surprising that that fact did not prevent them from doing it
a sweet / candy that you chew but do not swallow
